item.title: Start Multiple Instances Ideas
item.description: sometimes we need to start service with multiple instances with different ports, but default IDEA would not let to do that, how to do that? click the right upper inverted triangle of “Application”, then click “Edit Configurations” Check the checkbox “Allow parallel run”

item.title: Tab Completion Not Work in Ubuntu
item.description: Tab key auto completion not work in ubuntu.

item.title: Visual studio code can't run in ubuntu, how to?
item.description: Root Cause: This problem is that VS Code uses Electron, which is the root cause of the bug. Fix: mkdir ~/lib cp /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libxcb.so.1 ~/lib sed -i ’s/BIG-REQUESTS/_IG-REQUESTS/’ ~/lib/libxcb.so.1 export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=~/lib && code [reference!]https://stackoverflow.com/questions/55802252/visual-studio-code-wont-open-on-ubuntu-16-04-via-vnc
